• __version__
  • detect_shell
   1 import importlib
   2 import os
   3 
   4 from ._core import ShellDetectionFailure
   5 
   6 
   7 __version__ = '1.3.2'
   8 
   9 
  10 def detect_shell(pid=None, max_depth=6):
  11     name = os.name
  12     try:
  13         impl = importlib.import_module('.' + name, __name__)
  14     except ImportError:
  15         raise RuntimeError(
  16             'Shell detection not implemented for {0!r}'.format(name),
  17         )
  18     try:
  19         get_shell = impl.get_shell
  20     except AttributeError:
  21         raise RuntimeError('get_shell not implemented for {0!r}'.format(name))
  22     shell = get_shell(pid, max_depth=max_depth)
  23     if shell:
  24         return shell
  25     raise ShellDetectionFailure()
